message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $90. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll appreciate its value.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. I'm looking to save some money here.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $70 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit to $85, but that's my final offer. If we can't reach an agreement, I'll have to move on to other buyers.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $85 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $77.50. Can you consider that?

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $77.50 is closer to what I'm looking for, I'm still not comfortable going that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $81.25.  This is my final offer, and if it doesn't work, I'll be selling the product to another buyer.
I'm really close to making a decision, but I'm still trying to save a bit more. Can you meet me at $79.50? That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
